name: AVPlayerItemOutput
desc: An abstract class that defines the common interface to output media data from a player item.

items.name: func itemTime(forHostTime: CFTimeInterval) -> CMTime
items.desc: Converts a host time, specified in seconds, to the item’s timebase.

items.name: func itemTime(forMachAbsoluteTime: Int64) -> CMTime
items.desc: Converts a Mach host time to the item’s timebase.

items.name: func itemTime(for: CVTimeStamp) -> CMTime
items.desc: Converts a Core Video timestamp to the item’s timebase.

items.name: var suppressesPlayerRendering: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player object renders the receiver’s output.
